channel.title: Comments on: Switzerland – Day 5
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: Definitely. And it's amazing to me how some people live this kind of life... so different than ours, for better or worse. Thanks!
item.content:encoded: Definitely. And it’s amazing to me how some people live this kind of life… so different than ours, for better or worse. Thanks!

item.title: By: Ronnie
item.dc:creator: Ronnie
item.description:
Amit,
This trip looks INCREDIBLE. The pictures from the Glacier are really amazing. I guess it kinda feel like being in another world doesn't it?
item.content:encoded:
Amit,

This trip looks INCREDIBLE. The pictures from the Glacier are really amazing. I guess it kinda feel like being in another world doesn’t it?
